name: typescript-boilerplate
description: Typescript and Node boilerplate template developer ready üöÄ to get started quickly with all basic tools included and configured.

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm test && tsc
scripts.dependencies:purge: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json build && npm install
scripts.docs:generate: auto-changelog -p; rm -rf docs && typedoc lib/ --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out docs && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.docs:update: npm run docs:generate && git commit -m "üìù update docs"
scripts.docs:generate:html: auto-changelog -p; rm -rf docs-html && typedoc lib/ --plugin none --out docs-html && git add CHANGELOG.md
